teachers.bio: Sarah Walters is a robotics engineer in the Olin College class of 2017. She spent the past two summers working on CAD in the cloud at Onshape and on NLP data visualization at Systems & Technology Research, and she'll be a software development intern at Microsoft during the summer of 2016. Sheâ€™s fascinated by teaching and learning - her research is on assessment in the context of situational motivation in undergraduate STEM courses - and she plays piano and violin in her spare time.
teachers.name: Sarah Walters
